name: No more living
description:
In this game, the world has been destroyed because of zombie apocalypse has been started. Here, a man tries to get out of the supermarket to begin  his new world in the zombie apocalypse. So, he must need to escape the supermarket filled with zombies.

Asset used:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/animations/zombie-animation-pack-free-1...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/guns/low-poly-fps-weapons-lite-24...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/creatures/polygon-zombie-pac...
